strings.identification: General SC-1: gmd:MD_Metadata/gmd:fileIdentifier (Iso element nr. 2) has to be present and not empty.
strings.identification-2: General SC-2: MD_Metadata.referenceSystemInfo/*/RS_identifier/code (ISO element nr 207) has to be present and not empty.
strings.referenceSystemInfoMissing: Reference system missing. Horizontal or vertical reference system should be documented.
strings.referenceSystemInfoCodeMissing: Reference system code missing or empty. Horizontal or vertical reference system should be documented.
strings.referenceSystemInfoCodePresent: Horizontal or vertical reference system code is present:
strings.identification-3: General SC-3: organisationName (ISO-element 376) is present within each occurence of CI_ResponsibleParty and not empty.
strings.organisationNameMissing: Name of the responsible organisation is not present or empty.
strings.organisationNamePresent: Name of the responsible organisation is present:
strings.identification-5: At least one dutch keyword should be present out of the 'GEMET - INSPIRE themes, version 1.0' thesaurusâ€™ and dated 2008-06-01 if the MD_Metadata.language equals NL (ISO-element 55)
strings.noKeywordFound: No dutch keyword found from the GEMET-INSPIRE themes, version 1.0 thesaurus dated on 2008-06-01.
strings.keywordFound-2: from the GEMET - INSPIRE themes, version 1.0 thesaurus dated on 2008-06-01.
